metadata.title: CVE-2016-6746 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An information disclosure vulnerability in the NVIDIA GPU driver in Androidbefore 2016-11-05 could enable a local malicious application to access dataoutside of its permission levels. This issue is rated as High because itcould be used to access sensitive data without explicit user permission.Android ID: A-30955105. References: NVIDIA N-CVE-2016-6746.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
